titles: A third address directed to his Excellency the Lord Generall Cromwell, and the Right Honourable the Councell of State sitting at White-Hall Being the humble petition of Lieutenant-Colonell John Lilburne prisoner in Newgate.
author: Lilburne, John, 1614?-1657.
publisher: Printed by Tho. Newcomb dwelling in Thamestreet over against Baynards Castle,
notes: Dated at end: Newgate, this present Monday, being June the 20. 1653.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Lilburne, John, 1614?-1657 --  Imprisonment --  Early works to 1800.
